summary_md: Lithuania, in the year 2024, has a per capita GDP of 19,094 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 0.72% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 7.50% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 76.99 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 88.50% percent (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's GDP from exports is 74.11% percent (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Lithuania's economy is characterized by a per capita GDP of 19,094 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and a significant contribution from exports, which account for 74.11% percent (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Lithuania shows an unemployment rate of 7.50% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating the general employment situation.
sections.digital_md: Internet penetration in Lithuania is relatively high, with usage at 88.50% percent (IT.NET.USER.ZS), reflecting the country's digital infrastructure.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Lithuania is 76.99 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), suggesting the overall health environment.
